contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 12, 1985 D North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Four)
North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Four) 440 Own Choice Test Piece Contest North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival dronfield-contest-fourth-section
Sports Centre, Dronfield, Derbyshire Prizes - 1st £90 and trophy, 2nd £50, 3rd £40. 27th annual contest. 6 bands competed.
Feb. 6, 2017, 10:01 a.m. Feb. 6, 2017, 10:10 a.m.
1 Oughtibridge Band R. Kirkham
2 Dronfield (CMW) Band David Ablett
3 Ireland Colliery Band Francis Evans
4 Bakewell Silver Band L. Waterfall
5 Ashover Brass Band J. Slater
6 Rivington and Adlington Band Valerie E. Roocroft
Withdrawn Burbage Silver Band Don Redfern
Withdrawn Derby Railways B. Salmon
Withdrawn Scotter Silver Band Alan Needham
